summary: This is a present character Melissa.  She is a sorcerer's apprentice in the College of Winterhold.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#93c47d][size=4]BIOGRAPHY[/size][/color]

[size=3]Melissa is an orphaned teenager whose family was massacred by the civil war. She had the great fortune to study at the prestigious college of Winterhold. She dreams of becoming a great sorceress and get many work contracts to provide comfort and dignity to her younger siblings. The adaptation of Melissa at school was not easy she found it difficult to assimilate everything she saw, after all was something new and quite complicated. But with a lot of determination, patience and studies, she managed to become an excellent student. She was so envied that she suffered from bullying other students, but she never fought and not hold a grudge. Melissa is calm, smiling and very mature for her age. She strives to help someone in need and has a good heart. Sometimes she exaggerates a bit and puts the welfare of others above her. 
[/size]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/77918-3-1472162814.jpg[/img]

[size=3][b][color=#b6d7a8]
MELISSA SLOT 14
[/color][/b]
[/size]
[b][color=#93c47d][size=3]For Racemenu users you can try to import the FaceGen
[/size][/color][/b]

Start Skyrim and go into the character creation menu.
Load slot number, Slot 15. 
[/color]
